reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Its a powerhouse of gaming
reviews.reviewText: handheld emulator is an absolute delight for gaming enthusiasts like myself. Its compact size and sleek design make it incredibly portable, allowing me to carry a vast library of classic games in my pocket. The intuitive user interface and responsive controls provide a seamless and nostalgic gaming experience, reminiscent of the golden era of handheld gaming.I'm thoroughly impressed by the emulator's ability to flawlessly run a wide range of retro games from various consoles. The crystal-clear display and vibrant colors bring these old-school titles to life, evoking a sense of nostalgia while maintaining the charm of the original gameplay. The inclusion of customizable buttons and save states adds a modern twist to the retro experience, allowing me to tailor the gameplay to my preferences and convenience.One of the standout features of the Miyoo Mini Plus is its impressive battery life. I can enjoy hours upon hours of uninterrupted gaming on a single charge, making it the perfect companion for long trips or casual gaming sessions. The device's build quality feels solid and well-crafted, ensuring its durability over time.Navigating through the extensive game library is a breeze, thanks to the user-friendly menu system. I appreciate the attention to detail in organizing and categorizing games, making it easy to find and play my favorites. The expandable storage options provide ample space for loading up on games, ensuring that I always have a variety of titles at my fingertips.In conclusion, the Miyoo Mini Plus handheld emulator has rekindled my love for classic gaming, offering a convenient and enjoyable way to relive the past. Its impressive performance, user-friendly interface, and excellent battery life make it an exceptional choice for both retro gaming enthusiasts and newcomers looking to explore gaming history.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Miyoo Mini Handheld Game Console is a nostalgia-packed delight! The portable design makes it perfect for on-the-go gaming. The variety of retro games is impressive, offering a trip down memory lane. The controls are responsive, and the compact size doesn't compromise the gaming experience. It's a fantastic blend of old-school charm and modern convenience. Five stars for bringing back the joy of classic gaming in a pocket-sized package!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Go To Handheld Gaming Device
reviews.reviewText: It's definitely worth the small premium on this listing to get your device with Prime shipping. Came with a nice carrying case with enough space for some earbuds or anything little thing you want to store with the small net.Immediately replaced the micro sd card with a Teamgroup 128gb one. Installed Onion OS and this little device is so compelling to use. Great functionality and a sleep mode that isn't as perfect as a Nintendo Switch, but it only takes 5-10 seconds to boot back into your game.The ergonomics aren't ideal for long playing sessions. You'll have to find your optimal position to hold your device. Can even game one handed for RPG's.Plays all the way up to PS1 games, some are great for the screen, other text heavy games can be harder to get used to. GBA has perfect emulation, although the fast forward isn't as great (More like 1.5x - 2x speed).Look up Tiny Best Set: Go! for more setups for beginners.I take my Miyoo on long car rides and anytime I know I'm gonna be somewhere with a couple minutes to kill. So pocketable and portable. Great little device and can't wait for the next iterations. (I'm looking at you Miyoo Mini Flip)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing is Amazing!
reviews.reviewText: I’ll get the 1 minor gripe out the way first. I spent several hours going through this unbelievable list of games and marking favorites. As of last night I had 299. As I checked to write this review this morning, I only had 1 in my favorites list (see picture). I clearly have more than that in my recent review list. The con in that is, though all my favorites are marked, you can’t go to 1 section as intended to access them. That’s where this massive list turns into a con because finding the game you want to play can take some time. Small gripe because…THIS IS A DREAM COME TRUE!! I’ve been gaming for 36 yrs now and almost ALL of my favorites are in one well packaged little case. The size for me is perfect for what it is! The display is beautiful for every game from Super Mario Bros. NES, MK on the Genesis, and even arcade favorites like Shadow Warriors and Marvel vs Capcom! It even comes with a screen protector and cleaning kit. The sound is very accurate! Ryu’s classic “Hadoken!” and “Shoryuken!” shouts from Street Fighter II triggers so many great memories playing in the arcade as a kid. And there’s so many more games to explore from consoles I couldn’t possibly afford as a kid like the neo geo and games I didn’t know existed. Worth the money. The minor gripe is a small inconvenience in comparison to this over awesome deal. It also comes with a solid travel case to protect it custom made that does not feel cheap in anyway. I’d say that alone would be worth $20. Miyoo 4lyfe

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Buy a high quality SD card!
reviews.reviewText: Love the device, very cool and works well. The SD card and rom dump is low quality. Buy a brand name high speed SD card right away! If you like the setup back up the SD card it comes with. I found the game list to be lack luster and a handful didn't work. 3rd day I had it the SD card developed an error. It wouldn't play any games and the os load time was over a minute. I had a spare 64gb card so I downloaded and setup the system with a more curated list. It's easy and there are lots of youtube videos to walk you through the process.

The product arrived within 2-3 days here in Canada. Comes with a case, screen protector, cable and micro SD card.A simple YouTube search can get you set up and will let you know not to use the SD card it comes with but to buy your own reputable SD card and set it up with OS, ROMs and your own customized themes and icons.
El material se mira muy bien, corre todos los juegos con muy buena fluidez, definitivamente la recomiendo
Es una excelente consola retro, trae muchos juegos y además también ya viene con el nuevo Sistema operativo Onion Os

STRONGLY RECOMMEND YOU UPDATE BASE FIRMWARE.When I received it the volume buttons did not work and the screen had a red border. I changed firmare to onion (make sure you choose 4.2 beta) and everything worked perfectly. I am still figuring out PSX games but so far so good.
It is very good experience. On time delivery good quality products
